main event: On July 29, 1963, a city patrolman in Craig, Colorado observed a bright object resembling a star with flashing colors in the night sky.
interesting points: The object changed colors from red to white-blue and back to red., It was visible for a duration of 3 minutes., The observer reported no accompanying sound., The sighting was described as not astronomical and categorized as unidentified., The observer mentioned a prior sighting on May 29, 1963, of a similar object.
sighted object: A bright, flashing object in the sky
